Lisa Donohue

Professional Experience

Publicis Groupe

Expansive career in marketing at Publicis Groupe, 3rd largest Global Communications Holding Company with revenue of ~ €10B.

Decade focused in C-Suite management roles and on global executive leadership teams. Member of Publicis Groupe Management Committee helping define and operationalize strategy and leading 80,000 employees in over 130 offices globally.

Provided consultative consumer marketing services including business growth opportunities, transformation agendas, consumer centric strategies, omnichannel marketing spend allocations, ZBB cost management, marketing and technology audits.

Global experience spans many industry verticals and consumer facing businesses including retail, consumer electronics, FMCG, financial services, alcoholic beverages, healthcare, and entertainment.

Drove value for Fortune 500 and digitally driven/DTC companies including Airbnb, Best Buy, AB InBev, Samsung, Procter & Gamble, ESPN, Disney, Novartis, Bank of America, Kellogg’s, KraftHeinz, Visa, Beam Suntory.

4 A’s Board of Directors and Ad Council Board of Directors

CEO Publicis Spine Publicis Groupe

Created and led Marketing Technology start-up inside Publicis Groupe, reporting directly to the Chairman/CEO and COO of Publicis Groupe.

During tenure, Publicis Spine grew from zero to €20M+ revenue in SaaS + services model and contributed to conversion of $4.6B in incremental media billings.

Leveraged the collective power of data, technology and talent to provide marketing transformation services to clients.

Developed proprietary applied intelligence growth platform leveraging data, AI/ML and technology to identify and convert topline sales growth and improve operational efficiencies.

Ran M&A process aimed at identifying companies to accelerate platform development globally and increase high demand talent skill sets.

Managed 200+ globally distributed software development team - including GDD resources in India and Argentina – and unified 3,500+ data strategists, data scientists, data engineers and analysts globally to provide professional services.

Global Brand President Starcom Worldwide (2016 - 2017)&lt;

Led largest global media business unit of Publicis Groupe and top 3 global media services company. Reporting directly to Publicis Groupe COO.

Managed $75+ billion in global media billings, $625+ million in revenue and 7,100+ global employees in 100+ offices.

Delivered range of consultative marketing services to Fortune 500 companies including: growth and transformation strategies, omnichannel marketing and communications strategies, channel allocations, content strategies, measurement and data and technology maturity audits.

CEO Starcom USA, a division Starcom Worldwide

She Runs It

Co-Chair Foundation Board

Board President Operating Board

110 year history dedicated to supporting and empowering female leadership in the marketing, media, and technology industry. Services include mentoring, networking, community building, C-Suite industry speakers, education loan relief and job bank.

Guiding expansion of the SRI Foundation Board to more effectively leverage philanthropic giving to support the initiatives.

Milton Academy President Board of Trustees | 7 years

Trustee | 14years

$420M+ endowment with most recent completed Capital Campaign raising $180M+ for endowment.

Key initiatives include 10 Year Strategic Plan, Curriculum Renewal, Land and Property Strategy, Debt Refinancing and Campus Master Planning and Development

Helped guide institution through COVID-19 pandemic including focus on health and safety requirements, development of best-in-class remote and hybrid learning models across K-12 day and global boarding students
